title: Executive Order 7781-Amending Executive Order No. 5517 of December 17, 1930, Excluding a Tract of Land From the Chugach National Forest
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 4, 1897, 30 Stat. 11, 36 (U.S.C., title 16, sec. 473), Executive Order No. 5517 of December 17, 1930, excluding a certain tract of land from the Chugach National Forest, in Alaska, and restoring it to entry under the applicable public-land laws, is hereby amended so as to make the metes-and-bounds description of the said tract of land conform to the survey designated "U.S. Survey No. 2267, Alaska", a plat of which is on file in the General Land Office, Washington, D.C.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7781-Amending Executive Order No. 5517 of December 17, 1930, Excluding a Tract of Land From the Chugach National Forest Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/369042
